content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
If you like Korean food this place has the best home style Korean cooking in LA. Also their tofu soup is Mike's better than your usual spots like Surawon. The store itself feels like home, but service can get busy during lunch time. Have some patience :)
